${ModID}:Ignition.NAME: Ignition
${ModID}:Ignition.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Channel a ${ModID}:Blaze.

${ModID}:DualBlade.NAME: Dual Blade
${ModID}:DualBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Evoke your next Orb twice.

${ModID}:Sphere.NAME: Sphere
${ModID}:Sphere.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Channel a ${ModID}:randomized Orb.
